summary: Modular construction reduces waste and conserves resources in the construction industry.
embedded_value_reasoning: Modular Construction has a moderately high embedded value due to its innovative approach, resource efficiency, and growing market demand.
access_level_reasoning: Modular components are large and require infrastructure for transport and storage, reducing ease of access and increasing complexity.
processing_level_reasoning: Modular construction is moderately heavy, requires some technology for assembly/disassembly but is less toxic than electronic waste.
categories_reasonings: Modular components are designed to be easily disassembled, facilitating recycling and reuse of materials.
The design allows for reusing the same components in different projects, extending the product life and reducing waste.
